Hello

My name is Ben Schmaus.

I am a software developer and musician.

I enjoy spending time with creative people.

You can find me in various places on the Internet. For example, Twitter and LinkedIn.

Some things that may be of interest

I wrote a console app for viewing MIDI data in a web browser. It’s helpful for testing and debugging MIDI gear.

I developed patch editors for MeeBlip synthesizers and got to do an interview with Create Digital Music.

I’ve been referenced on popular music technology sites like CDM and Synthtopia.

I write music and play guitar.
